page.title: 10Leisure and Entertainment
page.content: In Whitstable there is a recreation ground where people can play on the grass or on swings, slides, roundabouts and climbing frames. There is a massive playing field where there is a football and rugby pitch. Other open grass areas include Tankerton Slopes and Duncan Downs. The Castle Grounds are pleasant Gardens for people to walk round. We have amusement arcades, betting shops and bingo halls. The local cinema has recently been turned into a bingo hall as local people prefer to watch videos at home. There is the Play House where concerts and plays are performed. There are three clubs for servicemen and for people who enjoy nature and animals. Also there is a Natural History Society, a flower club, a dog training club,an 18+ Group,a citizens advice bureau and a wine club.
